mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT substr(checkdate,1,4) YYYY FROM rate WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} ORDER BY YYYY DESC
SELECT DISTINCT substr(checkdate,1,7) MM FROM rate WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} AND checkdate LIKE "${yyyy + '-%'}" ORDER BY MM DESC
SELECT pkid,rate_name,rate,checkdate,checktime FROM rate WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} ORDER BY rate LIMIT 10
SELECT pkid,rate_name,rate,checkdate,checktime FROM rate WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} AND checkdate LIKE "${monthDetail + '%'}"
SELECT pkid,rate_name,rate,checkdate,checktime FROM rate WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} AND checkdate = #{checkdate}
mapper.update: UPDATE rate SET rate = #{rate},checktime = #{checktime} WHERE rate_name = #{rate_name} AND checkdate = #{checkdate}
